item.title: 美国前总统特朗普的律师周四致信纽约上诉庭，称其 4.64 亿美元的民事欺诈判决不可能获得保释。
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：拜登政府周四起诉苹果公司，指控这家科技巨头阻止竞争对手使用 iPhone 的硬件和软件功能，从而在智能手机市场上形成垄断。
item.description:

item.title: 一位邻居拍摄到的画面显示，盐湖城东南部发生了一起致命的住宅爆炸事故。
item.description:
Footage captured by a neighbor shows the aftermath of a deadly home explosion southeast of Salt Lake City.

One person was killed and another was hospitalized after a duplex exploded, officials said.

The cause is still under investigation. https://t.co/LkovUi3Ya9 pic.twitter.com/6B4i2CO1jV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: M.艾梅特-沃尔什（M. Emmet Walsh）是一位性格鲜明的演员，他曾在《血色单纯》和《银翼杀手》等影片中扮演过令人不安的角色，他的经纪人周三表示，他已去世，享年 88 岁。
item.description:
M. Emmet Walsh, the character actor who brought his unmistakable face and unsettling presence to films including “Blood Simple” and “Blade Runner,” has died at age 88, his manager said Wednesday. https://t.co/WjBnAphdxS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州州长凯-艾维（Kay Ivey）签署了一项大刀阔斧的法案，禁止将州政府资金用于州政府机构、高等教育机构和其他公共实体的多样性、公平性和包容性计划和办公室。

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）告诉沙特新闻媒体《哈达斯报》（Al Hadath），美国已向联合国安理会提交了一份决议草案，呼吁在以色列-哈马斯冲突中 "立即停火并释放人质"。
item.description:
The U.S. has submitted a draft resolution to the UN Security Council calling for "an immediate ceasefire tied to the release of hostages," in the Israel-Hamas conflict, Secretary of State Antony Blinken told Saudi news outlet Al Hadath. https://t.co/ftmCmAe0Y9 pic.twitter.com/oUJME0A4l6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 21, 2024
